EmailTemplate.name: Initial Inbound Lead Followup
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: Your recent inquiry Coursera for Business
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for reaching out to Coursera! My name is <> and I just left a voice message regarding your Coursera for Business inquiry. M
Best regards, Heliatrice
PS: You may be interested in this article about [ex: digital learning for the next generation of corporate academies]. REWARD
